features: Create adventures and scenes from Star Wars entertainment
Collect the wide range of articulated Star Wars action figures that are each sold separately
Most of the Star Wars vehicles have realistic action features
Pretend to be favorite characters with the role-play gear
Battle as a Jedi or a Sith, a Rebel or Imperial trooper, a Battle Droid or Clone Trooper
body.description: Enter a galaxy of adventure and imagination with Star Wars toys! This incredible saga of good versus evil in a galaxy far, far away includes some of the greatest heroes and villains of all time. Recreate exciting scenes from the films, television series, books and games with the action figures and vehicles. Pretend to be a favorite character with role-play gear including Lightsabers, blasters and masks. There is something for everyone young and old for playtime adventures and awesome collections. Jedi Knights, Sith Lords, bounty hunters and aliens of all kinds are here. For over 30 years, Star Wars has fueled imaginations and thrilled children and adults with the adventures of Luke Skywalker as he learns the ways of the Jedi, the dark villainy of Darth Vader, the wisdom of Yoda and the exciting events that reach across an entire galaxy. May the Force be with you! Star Wars toys are produced by Hasbro under license from Lucasfilm Ltd. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 117 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2015
reviews.reviewText: Ello Asty is a Resistance X-Wing Pilot. To clear confusion for some people, the "Resistance" is to this new trilogy what the "Rebels" are to the original trilogy. He is the first non-human X-Wing pilot that has been issued. As with all The Force Awakens Figures, he comes on a really beautiful card back that pictures the character in stunning detail. This Ello Asty figure has very clean paint apps. The aurabesh & other symbols on the helmet are clear & legible. He also has 5 points of articulation (if you want more than 5 POA then, you are going to have to buy TFA Black Series 3 3/4" or 6" figures). Also, the pilot helmet is non-removable. To be honest, my figure is going to be sitting in an X-Wing so, he won't need more than 5POA or a removable helmet. Asty does come with a hand blaster. Each hand holds the blaster snugly. He has a working holster which this blaster fits in nicely. In addition, he comes with a build a weapon piece. It doesn't add or subtract anything from the figure. You need the Snow Mission SnowTrooper & StormTrooper to complete the BAW piece. I wish a figure stand would have been included even though, he stands fine without it.All in all, he's a great figure. The card back is really well done. Amazon shipped him quickly & the card back wasn't damaged in any way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars there are still some very cool, well-sculpted figures
reviews.reviewText: Firstly, it is, obviously, disappointing that Hasbro has cut the articulation on the new 'The Force Awakens' down to only 5 points, but within that context, there are still some very cool, well-sculpted figures. Asty is one of the cooler ones- what he lacks in posability, he makes up for by being a well-sculpted, detailed figure. I wish his visor were translucent- the solid visor looks a bit cheesey. The ski-backpack combining accessory piece is a bit odd, but has more play value than some that come with other figures. He also comes with a small blaster pistol, which fits in his holster.

reviews.reviewText: Awesome Figure Great Detail and a working holster. Fits into Poes x-wing nicely

great add to a collector of star wars figures, very neatly packed, arrived on date with no issues, im happy with my purchase
